ctu_text:
There are a total 3 steps for creating an account at Portal - **I****st** **Step**: Input NGO/Entity Name exactly similar as given on PAN Card, Email and Mobile numbers should be working and accessible for OTPs. - **2****nd** **Step:** PAN of NGO/Entity needs to be given which will be matched with the name of NGO/Entity given in Step 1- **3****rd** **Step:** Password can only be created when Step 2 is passed successfully
> **Registration Process** **Step-01:** NGOs register online to apply for grants-in-aid administered by the [Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment. ](https://grants-msje. gov.
